game.name: Animals Memory
game.shortDescription: Animals Memory - is a card game that tests your memory. The objective of the game is tomatch cards with the same card picture.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Animals Memory - is a card game that tests your memory. The objective of the game is tomatch cards with the same card picture.

reviewHighlights.text: The best animal memory with different animals (& the only one i know) :P
Suitable memory game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children, teenagers and adults with 18 levels. Ranging from lightweight to...
